skills.name: Install Cypress
skills.pattern:
npm install cypress --save-dev
npx cypress open  # Open interactive UI
npx cypress run   # Run headless

skills.name: Cypress Config
Basic Test
Selectors
Actions
Assertions
Chained Assertions
skills.pattern:
cy.get('input')
  .should('be.visible')
  .and('have.attr', 'placeholder', 'Email')
  .and('be.enabled');

skills.name: Waiting
Network Intercept
Spy Requests
Fixtures
Custom Commands
Sessions
Viewport
Screenshots
Environment
Tasks
Aliases
Form Testing
File Upload
iFrames
skills.pattern:
cy.get('iframe')
  .its('0.contentDocument.body')
  .should('not.be.empty')
  .then(cy.wrap)
  .find('button').click();

skills.name: Shadow DOM
Clock Control
Stubs
Retries
Parallel
skills.pattern:
npx cypress run --record --parallel

# With Cypress Cloud or sorry-cypress

skills.name: Component Test
Storage
Accessibility
CI Integration
skills.pattern:
- uses: cypress-io/github-action@v6
  with:
    start: npm start
    wait-on: 'http://localhost:3000'
